title: How To Pronounce German Correctly (Cassette Rip)
description:
How to Pronounce German Correctly (Cassette Rip) 128kbps MP3


Audio + PDF


This is a re-upload. The previous upload had several audio glitches.


YOUR GUIDE TO BETTER
PRONUNCIATION IN GERMAN

How to Pronounce German Correctly is a comprehensive, self-contained program that will enable you to improve German pronunciation ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ including vowels, diphthongs, consonants, as well as stress and intonation patterns.

Designed for students or self-learners at the beginning through advanced levels, How to Pronounce German Correctly consists of an audiocassette and a complete User's Manual, which, together, cover all major aspects of German pronunciation. The cassette and manual take you step-by-step through the sounds of German ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ beginning with the five simple vowels, followed by the three umlaut vowels. Next, diphthongs, consonants, and special vowel and consonant variations are covered, concluding with stress and intonation patterns.

All of the German on the audiocassette is read with perfect clarity by native speakers who will guide you in the pronunciation of everyday words, phrases, and sentences.

The User's Manual features a transcript of the cassette, as well as explanations that expand on the recorded material. Free of linguistic jargon and technical language, the information in the manual will increase your knowledge of sound and word relationships, which, in turn, will lead to better pronunciation. How to Pronounce German Correctly presents the key intonation patterns of German simply and clearly, without the confusion usually caused by musical notes, numbers, or distracting codes.

The design of the program also allows you to use the audiocassette without the manual, so you can listen, practice, and improve your German pronunciation with convenience and flexibility.

All in all, How to Pronounce German Correctly is an indispensable key to improving your accent in German.
